name: Staring Contest (itch)
description:
Enter the next premier competitive multiplayer FPS — except instead of shooting people, you try to stare at your opponents as you navigate an impressionist nightmare world!

This game was made in 7 days for 7dfps 2021.

For some period of time after the jam, games will be constantly running at 7dfps.ocean.astra137.dev. Grab a friend or two and try it out!

Controls:

WASD - Forward, Left, Back, Right

Q/Shift - Down

E/Space - Up

Stare at your opponents for long enough to score. If your opponent catches you staring at them, they'll interrupt you, stopping you from scoring. Whoever has the highest score when the round ends wins!


Credits:

PureGarlic

tepichord

hextraza

astra
